contentfulPagePressRelease.title: مؤسسة قطر تستضيف حاكم جزيرة القمر الكبرى

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Hosted by Qatar Foundation, today, His Excellency Mr. Hassan Hammad, the ruler of the island of Grand Comore Islamic Federal Republic of the moon, on the sidelines of his visit to the State of Qatar.

He briefed His Excellency Mr. Hammad at the headquarters of the institution on how the performance of the Qatar Foundation, through the Education City, for its leading role as a center of academic excellence, embracing a range of high - end educational facilities , which include schools, universities partner, as well as Hamad bin Khalifa University, which said a national university .

This was followed by a short presentation session questions and answers, and then had the chance to see the guest Karim Panorama Urban Education City from the balcony of the eighth floor of the headquarters of the Qatar Foundation, which was discussed as well as future expansion plans of the institution.

At the end of the visit, His Excellency the Governor of Grand Comore island in the Guestbook your organization signed.
